name: Screen Toybox
description:
V 0.4.5 - Bouncing Title Update

What is this?: This game is meant to be played over your other windows as a distraction.

Controls:

KeyFunctionEscape - ESC
Quit Game/Return to Main Menu
ArrowsMove selection in MenuPlus/Minus +/-Add or remove spawning objectsR KeyRandomize Bubble ColorM KeyChange On Top ModeLeft ClickPop BubbleClick & DragThrow Physics Object

Modes:

Bubbles: Send your computer under the sea! Poppable bubbles can be increased with +.

Starfield: Watch stars zoom towards you. For more stars press +, no current limit.

Physics: Play with throwable objects. Press + to spawn some little men.

Source: Github Under MIT license
